root.title: Wusa Extracting Cab Files
root.description: Detects usage of the "wusa.exe" (Windows Update Standalone Installer) utility to extract cab using the "/extract" argument which is not longer supported. This could indicate an attacker using an old technique
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

falsepositives.item: The "extract" flag still works on older 'wusa.exe' versions, which could be a legitimate use (monitor the path of the cab being extracted)
